days.title: Day 1 Prayer
days.text:
In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Intro Prayer

Prayer for the Canonization of the Venerable Servant of God Fulton J. Sheen
Heavenly Father, source of all holiness, You raise up within the Church in every age men and women who serve with heroic love and dedication. 
You have blessed Your Church through the life and ministry of Your faithful servant, Archbishop Fulton J. Sheen. He has written and spoken well of Your Divine Son, Jesus Christ, and was a true instrument of the Holy Spirit in touching the hearts of countless people. 
If it be according to Your Will, for the honor and glory of the Most Holy Trinity and for the salvation of souls, we ask You to move the Church to proclaim him a saint. We ask this prayer through Jesus Christ, our Lord. Amen.
IMPRIMATUR + Most Rev. Daniel R. Jenky, C.S.C. Bishop of Peoria

Concluding Prayer

Eternal Father, You alone grant us every blessing in Heaven and on earth, through the redemptive mission of Your Divine Son, Jesus Christ, and by the working of the Holy Spirit.
If it be according to Your Will, glorify Your servant, Archbishop Fulton J. Sheen, by granting the favor I now request through his prayerful intercession 
(mention request here…)
I make this prayer confidently through Jesus Christ, Our Lord. Amen.
IMPRIMATUR + Most Reverend Daniel R. Jenky, C.S.C., Bishop of Peoria
Our Father Hail Mary Glory Be

Through his Excellency’s intervention, when there a negligible line of hope, this novena brought the much needed miracle that was we all thought was not in the cards for her. However, she is now in rehab and eating, which is the miracle I asked for.

from J.R.

Send me your answered prayers from the Venerable Fulton Sheen Novena
